Reference

  • hypermodern_python.console

hypermodern_python.console

The algorithm of Haugh transmission for circles.

class hypermodern_python.console.Hough_round(r)

Contain all the attributes and functions for implementing the Hough algorithm.

draw_circle()

Draw a red circle on the image.

Applies the circle pattern obtained in function “make_circle_pattern” to the image and turns the pixel red at the points of the circle.

Return type:

None

fit(im)

Сreates an image of the coefficient space using the original image.

Parameters:

im (ndarray) – image in the np.ndarray format

Return type:

None

make_circle(arr, i, j)

Draw a singe circle centered at a point (i,j) on the image arr.

Parameters:

  • arr (ndarray) – a twoyfh

  • i (int) – the coordinate of the center of the circle (axis = 0).

  • j (int) – the coordinate of the center of the circle (axis = 1).

Return type:

ndarray

Returns:

A two-dimensional array is an image of the coefficient space with a drawn circle.

make_circle_pattern(r)

Create a circle template.

Creates a two-dimensional array of 0 and 1, in which a circle is drawn using the numbers 1.

Parameters:

r (int) – the radius of the circle in pixels.

Return type:

ndarray

Returns:

A two-dimensional np.ndarray array of size r*r.

hypermodern_python.console.view(img)

Convert an array to an Image type image.

Return type:

Image
